author: Enoch Cho
comment: Wastes soo much baterrryyy All gone in like 1hr

author: Lucas Carvajal
comment: I can build better faves at watchmakers. Dont waist your money.

author: Tony Ho
comment: Compass mode and phone battery not working on Huawei Watch. The compass scale appears but doesnt move. Phone battery level is always at 100%. Would be great if it has more features such as Steps counter, calories and weather... And maybe an option to hide the watch icon from the App Drawer. But I am still using it as I simply love the design!

author: Jupiter Bright
comment: It's cool for sure but it looks a bit cluttered on LG Urbane because of the details on the edge... and I wish there's options to add glow effect to hour and minute hand. It's a bit hard to see sometimes with most details are overlapping in white colour as well
title: A bit touch up maybe?

author: Kelvin Jordan
comment: I was really looking forward to seeing how this looke don my Moto 360. The idea is great and it's such a beautiful design for a watch but this face doesn't do it justice. It's almost there but the image doesn't seem to be sharp enough. The dullness actually makes it a little hard to tell the time, every time my watch lights up I actually strain my eyes a little trying to figure it out. I know it must be difficult with all the black, but the watch could benefit from some sort of shadow, make the hands a little more 3D

author: Tin Bui
comment: Compass is fake "W"is always at 0900 and does not move. Batteries for phone and watch don't work. Timer for on/off can't be adjust. The only thing good about this watch is the look. But it is over price at $2 I kept it because I like the way it looks.
title: Most stuff are fake

author: Dan Cautella
comment: I have a moto360 that the compass/minutes mode not work. Can you verify this issue and fix those? The compass don't move.

reply.author: Alexander Slobodchikov
reply.content:
Hi Dan! Thanks for the reply! In which way the compass does not work? Does the compass scale appear and is not moving or the compass mode is not selectable in the settings?
PS Just tested it on Moto360, it works. I think this is some kind of misunderstanding, feel free to email me, I'll help to solve the problem.

title: Problems with Moto360

author: Yahya S. Badaoui
comment: The clock and numbers ain't sharp as images shown in description. Compass isn't accurate.
title: Low resolution

author: Andrew Givens
comment: The overall image quality of this watch face is sub-par. For 2.00$ I'd expect to have something with some clarity. All my other watch faces look crisp, this one is fuzzy. At first I thought there was something on my screen but nope. I'm using a Note 4 and Motorola 360.

reply.author: Alexander Slobodchikov
reply.content:
Hi Andrew! 
I have rerendered the watch face in higher resolution. Have you got the latest update (1.4)? Is it looks better than the previous version?

title: Bad quality image.

author: Blair Hartsfield
comment: Love this watchface.  Easily configured, great options.  About the only option that would be really nice to have/add, is to be able to change the color of the watch hour/minute hands to provide some extra contrast.

reply.author: Alexander Slobodchikov
reply.content: Thanks, Blair! Yes, black hands look not very contrast on the black watch face, but I tried to copy the original:) I'll think about setting to make they white.

title: Very Nice Watchface for LG G Watch R

author: Devin Wiggins
comment: I refunded my money back and broke a new record! Lol no way.
title: It's too small
